import React from 'react' import { RichText } from 'prismic-reactjs' import { linkResolver } from '../shared/utils/linkResolver' import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet' import Link from 'next/link'; import Layout from '../components/layouts' const RenderProductList = ({ products }) => { return products.map((item) =>

{RichText.asText(item.node.product_name)}

{RichText.asText(item.node.sub_title)}

) } const RenderBody = ({ productHome, products }) => (
{RichText.render(productHome.title, linkResolver)}
{}
 ) export default ({ data }) => { const doc = data; if (!doc) return null; return ( {RichText.asText(doc.node.title)} ); }
